ecoware.ecowareprocessor.kpi.filters

Class StandardKPIFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • ecoware.ecowareprocessor.kpi.KPIManager
      • ecoware.ecowareprocessor.kpi.filters.StandardKPIFilter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HPFilter, LPFilter

    public abstract class StandardKPIFilter
extends KPIManager
    Author:
    Armando Varriale

    This is an abstract class that provide an implementation of a standard KPI filter. It extends the KPIManager abstract class by adding some specific aspects (methods and properties) that characterize all KPI filters, but doesn't implement the "launch()" method (that will be implemented by specific subclasses).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StandardKPIFilter(Element xmlElement, String busServer, com.espertech.esper.client.Configuration esperConfiguration)
      Constructs a new StandardKPIFilter using the specified XML element.

    • Constructor Detail

      • StandardKPIFilter

        public StandardKPIFilter(Element xmlElement,
                 String busServer,
                 com.espertech.esper.client.Configuration esperConfiguration)
        Constructs a new StandardKPIFilter using the specified XML element. The bus server name (that is the hostname on which the bus server is running) and Esper configuration are also required.
        Parameters:
        xmlElement - the XML element (node) of the configuration file from which retrieve the information to build the KPI object
        busServer - the hostname on which the bus server is running
        esperConfiguration - the Esper current configuration (that is an Configuration object. For further detail see the Esper documentation).
